alert.note: Alert for Livingston Area; Paradise Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 6:35PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...Strong Thunderstorm Outflow Wind Gusts Possible for Park County through 800 PM MDT... Thunderstorms are moving into Park County from the west this evening. Little precipitation is expected from this activity, but strong wind gusts are likely. These wind gusts may travel well away from the main storm, producing sudden strong wind gusts, particularly in the Livingston area. Be alert and prepared for these strong wind gusts through the evening. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Livingston, Gardiner, Chico Hot Springs, Pine Creek, Chico, Corwin Springs, Emigrant, and Jardine. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, seek shelter inside a building or vehicle if storms approach.
